title: Task 1: Explain how a work demonstrates continuity within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the head of a Roman Patrician is characteristic of the artistic traditions of the culture in which it was created.
Response accurately uses ONE example of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the head of a Roman Patrician is characteristic of the artistic traditions of the culture in which it was created.
Response accurately uses TWO examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the head of a Roman Patrician is characteristic of the artistic traditions of the culture in which it was created.

title: Task 2: Explain how a work demonstrates change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the head of a Roman Patrician demonstrates change from earlier artistic traditions.
Response accurately uses ONE example of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the head of a Roman Patrician demonstrates change from earlier artistic traditions.
Response accurately uses TWO examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the head of a Roman Patrician demonstrates change from earlier artistic traditions.

title: Task 3: Explain why a specific work of art demonstrates continuity within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: The response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain HOW the head of a Roman Patrician expresses the values or customs of the culture in which it was created.
The response accurately uses ONE example of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain HOW the head of a Roman Patrician expresses the values or customs of the culture in which it was created.
The response accurately uses TWO examples of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain HOW the head of a Roman Patrician expresses the values or customs of the culture in which it was created.
